title: Hijackers Pass Through Security
description: The hijackers pass through security at Portland International Jetport in Maine. They board a flight to Boston's Logan International Airport, where they connect to American Airlines Flight 11.

title: Flight 11 Takes Off
description: American Airlines Flight 11 takes off from Boston bound for Los Angeles. There are 92 people on board.

title: Flight 175 Takes Off
description: United Airlines Flight 175 takes off from Boston, also bound for Los Angeles. There are 65 people on board.

title: Flight 77 Takes Off
description: American Airlines Flight 77 takes off from Dulles International Airport outside of Washington, D.C., bound for Los Angeles. There are 64 people on board.

title: Flight 93 Takes Off
description: United Airlines Flight 93 takes off from Newark International Airport en route to San Francisco. There are 44 people on board.

title: Flight 11 Crashes into North Tower
description: American Airlines Flight 11 crashes into the North Tower of the World Trade Center.

title: Flight 175 Crashes into South Tower
description: United Airlines Flight 175 crashes into the South Tower of the World Trade Center.

title: Flight 77 Crashes into the Pentagon
description: American Airlines Flight 77 crashes into the Pentagon in Arlington, Virginia.

title: South Tower Collapses
description: The South Tower of the World Trade Center collapses.

title: Flight 93 Crashes in Pennsylvania
description: United Airlines Flight 93 crashes into a field in Somerset County, Pennsylvania.

title: North Tower Collapses
description: The North Tower of the World Trade Center collapses.

title: U.S. Airspace Cleared
description: For the first time in history, the FAA grounds all flights over or bound for the continental U.S.

title: President Bush Addresses the Nation
description: President George W. Bush addresses the nation and vows to find those responsible for the attacks.

title: Rescue and Recovery Efforts Begin
description: Rescue and recovery efforts begin at the World Trade Center, the Pentagon, and the crash site in Pennsylvania.

title: President Bush Addresses Congress
description: President Bush addresses a joint session of Congress, declaring a War on Terror.
